str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To be possessed, be under the power of an evil-spirit or demon. Middle voice from daimon; to be exercised by a d?Mon.
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.
(lit: blunted) dumb, dull, deaf. From kopto; blunted, i.e. of hearing or speech.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and phero; to bear towards, i.e. Lead to, tender, treat.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From the same as therapon; to wait upon menially, i.e. to adore, or to relieve.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
(lit: blunted) dumb, dull, deaf. From kopto; blunted, i.e. of hearing or speech.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
(primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
